description: Capture the tree visualization and export it as a scalable SVG file. Maintains all styling and hierarchy information for use in design tools like Figma.
notes: Implemented SVG export utility with support for both D3TreeDiagram (native SVG) and BasicTree (HTML to SVG via foreignObject) visualizations. Includes download and copy-to-clipboard functionality with customizable export options.
title: SVG Export Functionality
